career.name: University of Guelph - Advanced Manufacturing Lab
career.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant (Part-Time)
description: Developed a machine learning-driven defect detection system, achieving 96% accuracy in quality control of automotive parts.
Reduced defective parts in an industrial paint line by 35%, resulting in significant cost savings.

career.name: University of Guelph - Advanced Manufacturing Lab
career.title: Lab Systems Administrator (Contract)
description: Set up and managed a Linux-based file server, improving data accessibility for research projects by 50%.
Designed custom-built computer systems, reducing downtime and improving overall lab performance.

career.name: Manouche Express Mediterranean Grill
career.title: Systems and Graphics Designer (Freelance)
description: Collaborated closely with a restaurant to design and update visually appealing menus, promotional materials, and event posters, enhancing marketing efforts.
Managed multiple design projects from concept through completion, working under tight deadlines to deliver creative solutions that met client needs.
